content.detailedDescription: In aug 2009.I am just going to report straight of the top of my head as i did before.In killarney manitoba , i was witness to many sightings, some with witnesses.The one that i can remember best and still leaves a lasting memory happened in aug 09.My daughter had a sighting of this orb glowing white it was big as 2 school buses belly to belly. we watched as it came down the street and stopped in the backyard and hovered there for a few seconds.A door in this storm or what i would call a very large ship  was cloaked , opened and the orb went into and the door closed.At the same time this storm was pulsating blue, red and white colors same place everytime.This was the second time i had seen this orb.But the first i had seen this cloaked ship.There was no dought in my mind this was aufo it sat for a few min.Approximatley 10 min.It then took off just as the morning sun was rising.I never saw it go cause it was so fast but, i watched the clouds going in the opposite direction were doing a million miles an hr.The sun came up and no storm and a beautiful day.As i said i saw some other sightings, a friend and i were looking at the stars when a brite white light came flyihg into sight stopped for a second then in a flash gone.I have also seen large ships in the sky over town which could be seen reflecting in the water , the stars didn't reflect but these did.A buddy and myself were in the town park one night.I asked him if he had noticed any ufo sightings and just as i had said this a small cigar shaped one flew by and down the shoreline.I thought wow this place is crazy.As i said before about the white orb, i was at my relatives and my uncle and auntie also saw this orb come across there farm land.My aunt missed getting a picture by seconds.I think i put new thoughts in my relatives as my uncle thought it was a astronaut coming down.I thought sure here in the boonies thats gonna appen and plus there were no reports of any kind the next day on tv.I could go on but i think this is good for now.Do i believe yes sir no dought we are not alone!I make this report on my life that it had happened!
content.summary: I have seen orbs before but this 1, came down the street over my house then stopped at the same time i had this  what i thought was a storm with lightning but no sound.A door opened and this orb we saw went in and the door closed.It sat there for app.10 m

content.detailedDescription: White disc object in south east direction at height approximately cloud height, moved for about 2-5 seconds before completely vanishing with no traces of it. there was no sound or trail from the object nor any colored lights. it was a dull white- greyish disc against blue sky.
content.summary: White disc object at cloud height

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were driving to the store when i noticed an orange light on the horizon.  at first i thought it was small and nearby but noticed it move behind a cloud that was quite a ways off.  i couldn't guess at the actual size of it but it would have been fairly large considering the distance.  the color and intensity of the light didn't change but as it was mid-day and easily visible at distance it must have been very bright.  there was no sound that i could hear but that may have been due to the distance.

i didn't know what to make of it at first but when it began making abrupt path changes i pointed it out to my friend.  he saw it as well.  we watched as it sped across the sky, behind buildings and clouds. it changed directions multiple times then came to a hover.  it hovered briefly then shot across the horizon and out of sight faster than i would think possible of normal aircraft.

i have no idea what it was and still think about it quite often to this day.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orange light with varied flight path, hovering and speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq by field investigator l.F. with witness on phone 7/5/2015
______________________________________________________________

in july or august of 1995, while we were hiking in the mountains south of hollister, ca. we saw faces in the mountain and took pictures. i thought i saw an indian and a brontosaurs carved in the mountain.
i recently reviewed the picture to blow it up and frame it, and saw the timeline of life. a brontosaurs resting his head on a gorilla, resting his head on a pterodactyl, resting his head on an alien looking face. all in all 7 total faces. the mountain is about 200 feet high and 500' wide or so. i do not believe the ancient indians could have created this without help.
the area has no trees and just brush. 
the day i took the pictures was sunny and bright and hot.
i want everyone to see the picture, but, i worry about persevering the area around site of the faces. i will show a copy to  my field investigator  and tell them exactly where  i took the pictures.
content.summary: In july or august of 1995, while we were hiking in the mountains south of hollister, ca. we saw faces in the mountain and took pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Wirral, merseyside, uk.
looking up in the sky from my back garden facing sw, noticed a silvery whiteish elongated cigar shape floating away in sw direction. 
clear sky, no clouds. first thought it was a plane but no noise or vapour trail and it would have had to be travelling on it's side. possibly a weather balloon but i've never seen a real one, only photographs. 
grabbed the binoculars and focused in on the object and it appeared white/silver shimmering surface with one vivid and two or three faint lines top to bottom and a dark patch or hollow in the centre. i'd say it was 8/10 times as tall as it was wide. it seemed as though it was changing shape or semi solid shimmering rather than solid surfaced. 
it seemed to be gaining height and or getting smaller as it moved upwards and further away towards the horizon. as it was disappearing i ran in to grab a camera to get a photo before it went out of sight but it was gone went i went back outside. 
100% sure it wasn't a plane as i live near a flight path, liverpool/ manchester and frequently see and hear all manner of planes flying in and out.
initially felt confused but then decided to write a report but didn't know where and this site was the first i've come across
content.summary: Upright cigar shaped, white with dark spot halfway, floated upwards until unobservable

content.detailedDescription:
While standing outside early this morning my girlfriend and i observed 4 distinctive star-like lights move across the sky. 

artist who work late nights, we were outside having a smoke break around 4:45am when we spotted the first light almost directly overhead, moving east to west. a few seconds later we observed another star-like object following the first one in roughly the same flight path and position. we watched as the first object became too faint to see while the other trailed behind.

about a minute later we observed two more star-like objects south of us, also moving towards the westerly horizon, crossing slightly underneath venus and jupiter in the westward sky.

the objects had no flashing lights and appeared to be very high in the sky. we checked satellite flight paths on the star walk app and confirmed that the iss and other major satellites were below the horizon at the time. we observed the objects continue to move westwardly, without setting, until they were too faint to see.
content.summary: 4 bright, star-like lights moving east to west. not planes or satellites (checked with starwalk app)

content.detailedDescription: It was at dusk following two days of 100 degrees temperatures. my fianc√©e and i were sitting outside relaxing on the back patio. i was facing north enjoying the pinkish colors in the sky. i noticed a lone star in the sky so i focus in on it and like i just stated "relaxing". suddenly it disappeared! no it wasn't an aircraft (blinking landing lights). the sky was clear. nothing but that one lone star. gone. somebody had to see this. july 5th, 2015
content.summary: Different

content.detailedDescription:
As soon as i saw them comming, i called the guy next door... to make him my witness. the picture attached is not a picture that i tolk, do to that i couln'd get my camera to work.

i made the picture as what we saw that night comming floting across the sky at slow speed.
content.summary: 16 orange/red lights in formation, one falling behind...

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking out side my dads house while i was smoking cigarette i saw the object i thought it was a plane then i know this it was a ufo disc when it got closer i started listening to it was zig zagging when i watched it with the red lights after few minutes later it disappared
content.summary: I watched it four   to seven minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the forest of midland michigan martial arts training during my training session.I felt like i was being observed yet i didn't see any predatory animals yet i still sensed i was being watched i continued to train i took a momentarily pause and i was surveying my surrounding areas when i happened to glance up towards a bird in flight and it was during that moment in time when i saw i was being observed by a aircraft silently hovering a silently moving towards me i approached the aircraft and i got as close to the aircraft as i possibly could get if i were to climb the limb of the tree nearest to me i could've jumped aboard the aircraft which i thought about doing to bring it down.As i stood at the ready to attack if provoked by the aircraft if need be.
i didn't know what this strange and foreign aircraft was i will say the aircraft had three sections and really tiny wheels and i thought to myself how are those tiny wheels going to support the weight of that aircraft it was neat looking and i was impressed with what i saw. as we observed each in a respectful way i was less then ten feet from the aircraft at this time period my curiosity brought me closer and i was thinking if it were to attack me how could i dismember the components of the aircraft to bring it down incase a battle were to happen i saw weaknesses in the aircraft which i planned to inflict upon the aircraft incase something were to happen upon greeting this aircraft which to this day i haven't seen an aircraft with the same structure as this one in appearance and shape. i did happen to take photos of the aircraft but my phone got water lodged and damaged before i could produce any photos of the aircraft.
i still have the memory though.
as for my feeling i wasnt frightened or afraid i was curious to come in contact with the aircraft and i feel that the operator driving the aircraft didn't expect to come across anyone during its maid voyage i'd move it'd follow i'd stop and it'd hover and wait till i made movement again then continue to follow and i found that to be weird yet exciting.
i went under foilage and was preparing to board the hovering aircraft as it inched closer to me.
after i went under the treetops the aircraft turned 180 degrees and did another 180 degrees as if it were searching for me at that point it began to slowly ascend higher above the treetops as it continued upon its path i stepped out of the shadows and it momentarily stoped and began to head back towards me and then it stopped as it did i bid it farewell and it took off at a high rate of speed and continued to gain altitude before it was no longer in my eye view.
and that was the last i ever seen of this aircraft.
afterwards after this strange encounter i kept this to myself for four years until i learned of mufons existence which is why iam contacting you now your the first to hear my altercation with this aircraft.
to see if maybe someone else may have seen what i saw on that day.
when the time comes i will draw a sketch of the aircraft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: How do i begin i was martial arts training in the forest when my senses alerted me i was being observed i momentarily stoped surveyed my surrounding  area where i was training i didn't see any signs of life so i went back into my routine then i happened t

content.detailedDescription: While siting in yard saw glowing objects .Like sun reflecting off ballons.But were moving to horizontal long distance not varien in hight.That caught my interest more then noticed as it enter clouds there appeared to be u.F.O.Triangle type shape.Still have hard time beleaving what i seen.Lost object as it flew over house's in area.
content.summary: Observed what appeared to be ballons floating . what appeared like sun ligh reflecting from them. it appeared strange two ballons would float same exact leval for that time distance .Thats when noticed as it moved though cloulds shape of somthing flying.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on highway looking at the city and seen an object over a building i can not explain
content.summary: Cloud like circle with ring around it

content.detailedDescription: When i first seen it it was bright white and changed to orange,it just stayed in one spot for 20 min,and got real small till i couldn't see it
content.summary: Its changed from white to orange

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on roof top and the weather was cloudy then suddenly a light came from the sky changing colour red blue white and it was coming from cloud but because of dense cloud it was not visible then i take out my phone and try to capture it but nothing captured in my phone i don't know why then another comes so as proof we called out many people and in 10min it disappered
content.summary: Was on roof top with friend and seen changing light

content.detailedDescription: I was watching something on communicating with aliens, i mentally tried and had a feeling to go outside and smoke a cig before the sun came up, i felt oddly excited, as soon as i walked outside my eyes fell upon a glowing orb like dot in the sky that crossed the sky and slightly stopping and hovering for a bit, i felt overwhelmed and filled with joy that i started to cry, i have seen them many times and knowing that they let me see them again like that touched me, it faded away like it wasn't there. then another appeared either smaller or further in the sky it was going in a slightly odd path above me that curved slightly and then faded away after a while, then near the same spot a blue beam of light shot across the sky disappearing.
content.summary: A moment of comunication

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, thank you for letting me tell my story. it was early to mid 70's and my siblings, some neighborhood kids and myself were playing hide n seek. i was attempting to hide 3doors up from home, in the alley way that separates the homes by 2s, as i was approaching the gate to open it, 2 dark, approx. 5-6",long lanky arms, torso and legs and upsided triangle shaped heads and huge fly shaped eyes, appeared from around the back of the home. i was frozen with fear when one of the aliens raised a arm showing three fingers with bulbous type tips, i ran home jump in my bed under the covers. my mom came to check on me and i told her what i saw and laughed and said i couldn't have seen what i described.

for 3 straight days from the initial sightings, when i would go to bed i would be awaken by what i called "the little green men" and they would be 4 on each hand with what i thought was dental floss, 2on a finger cutting my fingers leaving paper cut cuts on each digit of my fingers. the other odd thing was i couldn't scream or move while this was happening and afterwards i immediately went to sleep. i would tell my mom and siblings and they would laugh and say i was dreaming and scratching myself.

i knew what i saw and experienced was truly happening but no one believed me so i just didn't share my story until in the 90's and more and more people were seeing the two aliens that greeted me but no one ever made mention of "the little green men"

i said all of this to say thank you netflix for airing "sirius" for in this documentary there "it" was one of the "the little green men" just as i remembered. thank you all for proving to all of whom i told my story to that i was not "crazy". i get the last laugh. thank you thank you
                                             sincerely,
                                             ms. linda carter
content.summary: Visitations from aliens

content.detailedDescription:
First i was playing a pc game and it was glitching out i was playing a race car game and the screen was like falling and shining red and blue light it was strange then i went outside for a smoke and saw a solid light float across sky
 stood in a better spot to view it then i saw 2 lights racing across sky real close to each other slowing down then becoming one light then light stated showing up next to it and absorbing them.This has happened before but to tell the truth it is like i am making contact and that is strange...
content.summary: Saw 2 lights race across sky then become one then 3 then 4

content.detailedDescription:
I found this when viewing a pic i took while traveling through montana in late june of this year.
 when i zoomed in on the squigglys in the right upper portion,
 i got chills..
content.summary: Found upon closer inspection of picture

content.detailedDescription:
Wife, kids and i took palm springs tram to mt. san jacinto. on ride down, i snapped these photos from my mobile phone. we saw nothing on the tram ride that drew our attention. only later, when viewing photos did i see the two brightly lit "objects"  

frankly, i think they are probably reflections of some sort off of the plexiglass windows. why i decided to send these in is in one photo, there is what appears to be an obvious reflection in upper left. in this photo, the reflection is fuzzy. in the same photo and the second one, the "objects" are both clearly defined with six lights around the perimeter. may be reflections of interior lights of tram. i simply don't know
content.summary: Photos are from palm springs tram ride. only saw object after event.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: My small children and myself were walking around the park picking berries on a nice sunny warm day not many clouds in the sky, and we looked up and sighted a white round ufo stationary in the sky. it was around 5pm and i had my cannon camera with me and so i started to film it. my young toddler was crying in the stroller so i didn't film it for long because it was distracting me and i couldn't get the camera to be still in my hand but i still managed to get a great video of what we saw. a moment after turning off the camera i looked and it was gone. i told my 5 year old maybe it will come back and let us watch it after we pick some more berries and so we walked for a few minutes and looked and it was back again. it seemed to super slowly move a tiny bit if you were sitting still watching it. it was pretty amazing. it disappeared right in front of our eyes. not long after seeing it we saw a white airplane roughly the same area and height in the sky. comparing the size i would say the ufo was maybe half the size of the airplane. i wasn't afraid and i wanted to see it again but we continued to the playground area and i looked a few times and didn't see it again.
content.summary: Walked to clark creek park in salem with children and was talking and looked up and we saw and filmed ufo during the day

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting out on the deck. noticed a big orange light in the sky. it hovered and the disappeared. it was definitely not an airplane or star. sighting occurred in dequincy louisiana
content.summary: Bright orange fire like light appeared then hovered and gradually faded

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed at fob wolverine and i was in charge of the uso. i stepped outside the doors to smoke a cigarette and noticed over the mountain there was a weird ball just hovering at around 6am. as i smoked i watched as the object moved around. at first it moved from side to side and then moved up and down. after watching it for a few more minutes if appeared to move around in almost a figure 8 shape. i noticed it over a period of 4 days. after noticing it after 2 days i decided that i would go ahead and bring my camera along with me (canon 60d slr). i snapped a few pictures and then as i finished my cigarette i went back outside. i stepped out again an hour later and the object was gone. but over the period of about 4-5 days the object would hover and make figure 8 shapes in the same spot at around the same time each morning. eventually it stopped and i never saw the object again.
content.summary: Weird ball hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bed watching a show on my laptop, nothing was out of the ordinary when suddenly my whole house started to shake and i heard a loud whirling swoosh as if a helicopter was in my living room or above my house.  i checked all of my bedroom windows to see if i could observe anything in the sky, after that i checked the second bedroom and also saw nothing.  the sound was still incredibly audible so i went to go outside but as i went to go towards the front door it seemed to get somewhat less loud and then once i was at the door it was suddenly gone completely.  at the time i had checked multiple windows to see the sky and saw no lights, after the noise was gone i likewise saw no lights in the sky to indicate aircraft or anything, it simply came and vanished.
content.summary: Suddenly and loud helicopter like whirling

content.detailedDescription: i was riding my bicycle on clifton ave in brockton,ma. as i turned on to green pl. i noticed at my 2 o'clock a small glowing ball in the air about 100ft of the ground and a couple hundred yds away. first thought drone, because of slightly unstable flight... as i was getting closer i could see it was a orange orb,  the orb continued its path, and it was still what looked like wavering. i could see that i was going to be right under this orb on irvington st.. so i waited under a tree, for the orb to come over the tree and into a clear area, no trees. as soon as the orb was directly above me, and i was consciously aware of what i was seeing..The orb reacted.. it vibrated(shimmered)and dropped 4 small balls or particles, they fell about 1 foot below orb, leaving trails and disappeared.. what also could have happened is that the orb vibrated and rose 1 foot appearing to drop particles...  the orb then had a straight controlled exit out of area,, leaving at a constantly increasing speed until it was out of sight in the s.E....  i was very excited and interested in what i was seeing.. i knew i had seen something special, something i will never forget..
content.summary: I saw orange orb, continued riding bicycle knowing i would intercept.. it passed directly above me.. and reacted to me,, it vibrated, dropped 4 small orbs and took off,, constantly increasing speed until it was out of sight..

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom on the south end of the house, i was watching a video on my cell phone and noticed two objects passing my window, i immediatly knew it wasnt anything i have ever seen before, as it passed my property i ran downstairs outside to get a picture. the two objects were 2 glowing orbs that looked like almost fuzz, the two objects were slowly moving in perfect sequence. i tried to call for another witness, at that time the colors of the objects began to fludder and then eventually go dark and then i lost them behind the trees, i did capture a photo. i have the original picture which you cant tell theres anything do to the dark skies, i also have the image where i distorted the colors and you can see there are two objects in the sky. im a 27 year old man i dont get scared or freaked out easily but this had my heart pounding and nerves flowing
content.summary: Two glowing orbs floated in perfect sequence past my window, i got outside the lights fludderd out and was lost behind the trees

content.detailedDescription:
This video was taken in december 2013 in carlsbad, ca and don't really remember the actual time.

this video is actually 2 videos put together.
the first half is original footage, and the second half is the identical footage (but zoomed in a bit .. have no idea how much zoom)

i don't really have any software that i can use to really zoom in, but i figured you would, which is why i left the first half unchanged.

if you want the video (without the zoomed in part added to the end), let me know and i can upload it.

thanks for doing what you are doing.

have believed in ufo's since i was about 10 years old (64 now).
content.summary: Seemed much clearer to the eye than in the video

content.detailedDescription: On july 3, 2015 a couple of friends and i went to a firework show at mountain meadows park in moorpark, ca; just like we do every year. a few minutes after it started some of the stars stared to look like they were moving, but i ignored it thinking it was just my imagination. then, a few minutes after that i noticed two lights in the north east that started flashing green and red but they were stopped in mid air. i kept watching them as they came from a hovering position to darting across the sky and then stopping at another point. i poked my friend sitting next to me and showed him these two lights, at first he didn't look but then we started to notice that not too many people were watching the fireworks anymore, but instead these dancing green and red lights. they seemed almost as if they were interested in the explosions but when the show ended they both turned yellow and took off to the south east. after it was over i asked someone who worked for the air force that was sitting next to me watching the if he knew of any aircraft that could do that and his answer appeared to be no. as we left i saw about five helicopters hovering around on the opposite side of the show as the ufos.
content.summary: Two lights stopping and accelerating at extremely high speeds and stopping at another point in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my house looking at the stars and constellations that i could see. as i was looking at the constellation ursa major which was in the north west, i saw this object (orb) of light appear to the left of it out of nowhere. the object (orb) appeared very dimly then got brighter and pulsated for a short period of time, then got very dim and disappeared. i went back inside and told my mom what i saw and she joined me outside, and i pointed to her the direction that i saw the object (orb). and at that time we both witnessed the object (orb) come from above the tree line like it appeared to be hovering there, and it started to raise toward the handle of ursa major. as is was raising it would get bright and pulsate then got dim and disappeared and this happened twice, both times it started at the tree line and raising to the handle of ursa major. the first sighting by myself lasted no more then 10 seconds, but no shorter then 5 seconds and was north west to my home. the second sighting where my mom and i both witnessed lasted about 5 to 7 seconds. then the third sighting happened about 15 minutes after the first too, and this time it was south west to where my home stands. the object appeared to the right of the constellation scorpius, just like the other two sightings the object (orb) behaved the same way. it appeared to be hovering right at the tree line and went right to left and disappeared in a flash of light. it got brighter then the planet saturn which was very visible the night this happened, the flash was blue in the center and white as it faded out (like a flash from a camera). the time of the first sighting was about 9:30 pm, the second sightings was about 9:35, and the last sighting where the object (orb) disappeared in the flash was 9:45.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: )rb of light observed.

content.detailedDescription: It hovered 3 football fields at least in size with lights pulsating all movement of motor vehicles stopped frozen doors opened no missing time.
content.summary: Large circle with lights under and doors that slide open everything stopped around its

content.detailedDescription:
July 14 2015, approximately 21:24.

was driving back to my house after getting fast food. noticed a bright light above the road, thought it was odd since it was still light out. initially thought it had to be a planet or very bright star to be so prominent in the daylight. as i came around a curve in the road i noticed a second dimmer orb. slowed to approximately 5 mph. the second orb slowly began to increase in brightness until it was brighter than the first. both lights began slowly pulsing. the second orb, which was to the right of the first but on the same elevation began to move from my west to north. the second light followed. at this point i stopped my vehicle, rolled down window and turned off radio, no noise at all was noticed. orbs were slowly moving at a constant speed. no change in color occurred. after about 5 minutes the lights began to dim at exactly the same time until they flashed and disappeared. no objects were seen after lights vanished, it was still daylight. at first thought it was a chinese lantern due to their frequent releases in this area but i have never witnessed one pulsate or vanish in such a manner. no secondary lights of other colors were observed so i discounted airplanes and they appeared far to close for planes.
content.summary: Two orbs observed, hovered then one began to move, other followed, slowly pulsated then dimmed and vanished.
